resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Experienced Quality Assurance and Document Control Specialist with a strong background in GxP compliance, clinical and manufacturing environments, and regulatory documentation. Skilled in managing QDMS systems such as Veeva Vault, coordinating audits, reviewing batch records, and ensuring accuracy in SOPs and labeling. Proven ability to collaborate across QA, QC, R&D, and manufacturing teams to drive compliance and process efficiency. Adept at using tools including Oracle, SAP, Salesfor
